channel.title: Startups Educación | EdBase - Recently Added Listings

item.title: Marcelo Burbano
item.description: Strategic and financial advisor of choice for global CEOs and business leaders. Top executive at leading food & beverage company in Latin America. Former leader at top management consulting firm. Former M&A and corporate finance advisor at top investment bank. Substantial experience conducting macroeconomic, financial and strategic projects for private equity firms, multinationals and family-owned corporations. On-the-ground experience across United States and Latin America in different industries including Agribusiness, Consumer, Education (for-profit and non-profit), Fashion, Industrials, Retail, Technology and Real Estate. Extensive network and experience in different segments of the international and domestic education industry including post-secondary education (i.e. for-profit higher ed and technical institutions), K12 (e.g. international schools), testing and assessments (e.g. GMAT, SAT, GRE), credentials and certifications (e.g. CPA, CFA, ACCA), language training (e.g. English language centers, English online training), etc Consumer packaged goods experience ranges from different geographies to different segments including food & beverage manufacturers to services. Most recently focused on dairy food and beverage products. Specialties: Mergers and Acquisitions; Capital Raising; Brand and Competitive Analysis; Market and Strategic Due Diligence; Market Research; Macroeconomic Forecasting. Econometric Modeling.
item.dc:creator: Marcelo-Burbano-linkedin

item.title: Marcelo Burbano
item.description:
Strategic and financial advisor of choice for global CEOs and business leaders. Top executive at leading food & beverage company in Latin America. Former leader at top management consulting firm. Former M&A and corporate finance advisor at top investment bank.
Substantial experience conducting macroeconomic, financial and strategic projects for private equity firms, multinationals and family-owned corporations. Extensive network and experience in different segments of the international and domestic education industry including post-secondary education (i.e. for-profit higher ed and technical institutions), K12 (e.g. international schools), testing and assessments (e.g. GMAT, SAT, GRE), credentials and certifications (e.g. CPA, CFA, ACCA), language training (e.g. English language centers, English online training), etc
Consumer packaged goods experience ranges from different geographies to different segments including food & beverage manufacturers to services. Most recently focused on dairy food and beverage products.

item.title: Vicky Ricaurte
item.description: Mama emprendedora con experiencia substancial en operaciones y marketing. Mi pasión son mi familia, la tecnología y educación. Me encanta apoyar a las mujeres emprendedoras de base tecnológica.
item.dc:creator: Ana-Victoria-Vicky-Ricaurte-linkedin

item.title: Arunovo
item.description: Arunovo te ayuda a entrenarte para los trabajos del siglo 21. Aun no sabes como crear un iphone app? un Android app? Ven nosotros te enseñamos!
item.dc:creator: Ana-Victoria-Vicky-Ricaurte-linkedin

item.title: Glean
item.description: Glean aggregates over 15,000 of the best instructional videos on YouTube, organizes them by educational standard, and adapts these videos to a student's learning abilities and learning style.
item.dc:creator: Glean-teamglean-twitter

item.title: Tic-Toc Apps for Kids
item.description: Tic Toc busca desarrollar apps o juegos educativos para niños que aporten verdaderamente a su desarrollo y bienestar. Solo ahora, con la aparición de las pantallas táctiles en las tabletas y dispositivos móviles, estamos por primera vez siendo testigos del surgimiento de una tecnología para primera infancia asequible y apropiada desde el punto de vista de su etapa de desarrollo. Es sin embargo preocupante ver cientos de juegos para niños que no contribuyen al desarrollo de los niños, y que literalmente solo ayuda a que pierdan su tiempo frente a una celular. Tic Toc apps solo desarrolla aplicativos que aporten al desarrollo de los niños.
item.dc:creator: Julian-Echeverry-julianez34-twitter

item.title: EduFolium
item.description: EduFolium es un sitio para docentes y colegios, donde además de encontrar Empleo para Docentes, los educadores también se podrán CONECTAR, COMPARTIR y CREAR información con otros colegas.
item.dc:creator: Julin-Echeverry-Zapata-google
